thread.title_full: /C O R R E C T I O N -- CMTL/

author: admin
title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- CMTL/
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 1:37 PM   CMTL 
In the news release, SanDisk® Fully Implements CMTL Flash Memory Products Pre Qualification Testing Program, issued 09-Oct-2015 by CMTL over PR Newswire, we are advised by the company that the quote by John Deters in the second paragraph was originally issued incorrectly, and has been updated. The complete, corrected release follows: 
Release Update: SanDisk® Fully Implements CMTL Flash Memory Products Pre Qualification Testing Program 
ANAHEIM, Calif., Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CMTL , ( www.cmtlabs.com ), Computer Memory Test Labs, the industry's leading independent memory products compatibility and functionality testing lab announced today that after several months of development and tests performed, the CMTL computer platform compatibility pre qualification test program performed for SanDisk is fully operational. The SanDisk pre qualification program is the first of many new programs and services that CMTL plans to introduce as it aggressively expands testing services into the flash/SSD market, which CMTL states represents an explosive growth opportunity. 
CMTL President, John Deters stated, "CMTL is excited to have an independent compatibility testing program relationship with SanDisk, the industry's most well known name and leader in the flash/SSD market place." Deters added, "The pre-qualification program is one additional step in the SanDisk product release process. The program ensures their customers receive products that been independently cross tested for functionality and compatibility on CMTL's reference group of platforms that contains a multitude of manufacturers and models including various Intel NUC platforms." 
CMTL was established in 1996, as an independent third party memory products test lab to ensure memory product compatibility and functionality on any platform or system combination. To date CMTL has performed over 25,0000 computer memory product/platform advanced compatibility and functionality tests. 
SanDisk is a registered trademark of SanDisk corporation. 
Contact: John Deters, CMTL , 770-238-2085, jdeters@cmtlabs.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sandisk-fully-implements-cmtl-flash-memory-products-pre-qualification-testing-program-300157142.html 
SOURCE CMTL
